thread.title: A great priced hotel closed to downtown.
thread.title_full: A great priced hotel closed to downtown. - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: georgehB2452YN
title: A great priced hotel closed to downtown.
text: This is a fairly new hotel. The rooms are great and the price reasonable. The hotel is also very close to the city, either by taxi or subway. I visit the city often and this location is great. The rooms are clean and the beds good. The hotel has a restaurant and their are others within walking distance.
